Articles.Content: Started finishing up the textures for the Fairings for the payload pack. I hope you guys like what I have in store!!!

Started finishing up the textures for the Fairings for the payload pack. I hope you guys like what I have in store!!!

Ab-so-lute-ly!

Heres another toy im playing with, a side fairing to hold your payloads in place while traveling in atmospheres..... or just for fun

Edited August 15, 2012 by Johnnyd

Rover system slowly taking shape

I already tried the rover out ingame and there are some failures with it but noting I can't handle. Rover is getting a revision but the platform on it will stay.
It's coming along quite well
Can you create only the parts of the rover? (Wheels, Camera, Energy Panels...) I really like this mod.
We are getting a bit closer to the fairings being complete. I hope others are excited as I am.

I'm a big fan of rovers and fairings, so you're not the only one who's excited Looking at the release thread, it allows for a lot of variation and flexibility, which is EXACTLY what I want and need for fairings, so I'm following this curiously
I like the textures very much, so i'm a bit impatient witing for the final (complete) result.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6C3R9Hdm7CU&feature=youtu.be
Nice video, next time can you have more time showcasing the thingy and less time landing. Half the video is the thing falling. Looking forward to release!

I've made a 2m high and 2m wide compact landing system (including Rover) which can land on any planet. Only thing to do is to change those lights and animate them so that they will fit within a 2m payload fairing.

This is made without any overpowered elements (only rover is a bit on the lightweight) and each element can be used for other designs.

You,sir, have my full attention

Lovin the Kethane pack, by the way. Can't wait to see where you and the team take it.

Miner and Sniffer(probe)

The miner is version one and never actually mined anything. It was just a flight test. version 3 has double the batteries and 3 drills(version one had 6) and 4 parachutes other then that they look the same.

The "Sniffer" I am very happy with. Pat myself on the back for the "3d" design, as simple as it may be

You,sir, have my full attention

Lovin the Kethane pack, by the way. Can't wait to see where you and the team take it.

Miner and Sniffer(probe)

The miner is version one and never actually mined anything. It was just a flight test. version 3 has double the batteries and 3 drills(version one had 6) and 4 parachutes other then that they look the same.

The "Sniffer" I am very happy with. Pat myself on the back for the "3d" design, as simple as it may be

Glad you like it, and stay here if you want to stay updated with all the good stuff

The payload fairings are nearing completion i am really excited to get these fairings released to the public. Any im even more excited to see the rover coming close to release! Thank you all for your support and for enjoying out mod packs!

The payload fairings are nearing completion i am really excited to get these fairings released to the public. Any im even more excited to see the rover coming close to release! Thank you all for your support and for enjoying out mod packs!

No, we thank you!

By the way, I've just found something awesome, that you all may like to take a look at!:

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Philae_(spacecraft)
Currently in testing face with payload fairings, they don't wobble, but they aren't working the way we want them either. Maybe tomorrow release.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YC1FtN0dbY4&feature=youtu.be



Made a little video about the payload fairings
Think I'm going to make more videos from now on.
Making more and more progress. The whole system works, just need to do the painfull job of texturing

Will we be able to surface attach things to the rover? Like camera's and whatnot.

Also, why not make the plf bases decouplers themselves? Like in KW's PLF set

Dani,

in the full kethane mod pack release will kethane be more common?

Rover will be opensource idea. More info later

About Kethane, kethane will be probably not more commen, but I think we are going to increase detection tools.
Everything is looking great Can't wait to try out that rover.

I made a fuel refining colony on the Mun with your Kethane mod, including a tanker to deliver unrefined kethane to the main colony, and refinery rovers that refueled other spacecraft.

Any chance we could get something that adds new landing gear, or some kind of wheels or whatever?

Loving all of this.

Any chance there will be larger payload fairings added to the pack? The 2m fairings can only cover pretty small payloads.
